enhanced_by.reason: Environment setup is required before generating an IMEI to ensure consistent and valid results.
The imei method relies on faker.options().option to select the initial prefix, indicating a dependency that should be tested.
The imei method calculates a Luhn checksum, and validating this checksum is crucial for asserting the correctness of the generated IMEI.
The imei method generates a string that should conform to the IMEI format. Verifying this format is essential for test assertions.
